channel.title: Diamond Lake on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Diamond Lake on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: OR-138 West at OR-230
item.description: OR-138 West at OR-230 west to Diamond Lake South Shore and Medford. On the day this photograph was taken a forest fire had closed down OR-230 west, as well as the campgrounds at nearby Diamond Lake. Continue west on OR-138 for Diamond Lake North Shore and Roseburg.
